title: Beef and blue cheese puff pastry pizza
description: Ready-made puff pastry is a great ‘cheat’ for pizza. Topped with rich beef, a creamy cheese sauce and tangy onions, this version is hard to beat.
ingredients: 1 tbsp double cream, for the glaze
3 small red onions, peeled and cut into six wedges with the root intact
75g/2¾oz soft blue cheese, such as Dolcelatte
salt and freshly ground black pepper
